name: Going Nuts (itch) (mshoul)
description: Going Nuts is a first person 3D endless runner full of fun. You are playing as a squirrel who is running to collect as many acorns as possible. Collect enough acorns and you can enable a powerup. Don't forget to duck, dodge, and jump from the obstacles on the branch to achieve the furthest distance. But most importantly ... go nuts!
